summary: This is a brief email chain from July 10, 2019, forwarding a question about the Epstein case. The forwarded message asks if the FBI is sending six grand jury subpoenas to co-conspirators that day and requests confirmation.

persons.name: ODAG
persons.context: Appears as the sender and recipient of the forwarded email inquiring about FBI activity regarding grand jury subpoenas in the Epstein case.

persons.name: USANYS
persons.context: Appears as the recipient of the initial email forwarding the question about FBI grand jury subpoenas.

connections.description: ODAG forwards an internal question about FBI grand jury subpoenas to USANYS.

events.title: Inquiry about Grand Jury Subpoenas
events.description: An email is forwarded inquiring whether the FBI is sending six grand jury subpoenas to co-conspirators in the Epstein case on this date.

keyFacts: On July 10, 2019, there was internal DOJ correspondence regarding the Epstein investigation.
The correspondence references the FBI potentially sending six grand jury subpoenas to co-conspirators.
The email seeks confirmation or information about this specific legal action.
